comments.comments_text: Goal - 0:1! Dennis Praet laid the ball off to Antonio Sanabria (Torino), who slots it into the back of the net from close range, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

comments.comments_text: 2:1. Marten de Roon (Atalanta) latches on to a pass on the edge of the penalty area and immediately fires a fantastic first-time shot into the top of the net. What a finish that is! Vanja Milinkovic-Savic did his best to stop it, but the shot was just too good. Luis Muriel provided the assistance.
